entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:52 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Pocatière 3:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 2:52 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain or periods of drizzle ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:52 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 2:52 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
